FuncDef:
The access-user board-schedule command enables downstream HQoS scheduling.
The undo access-user board-schedule command disables downstream HQoS scheduling.
By default, downstream HQoS scheduling is not enabled, and CAR is used.After the PAF file is loaded, if SPEC_FUNC_QOS_SUPPORT_BRAS_SQ is set to 0, CAR is still used. If SPEC_FUNC_QOS_SUPPORT_BRAS_SQ is set to 1, SQ is used.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
User access: When TM-installed subcard is not in position, the downstream HQoS is disabled by default. HQoS configured by users will be forcibly converted to CAR to limit the rate. To implement HQoS in this case, run the access-user board-schedule enable outbound command to enable the downstream HQoS.
Precautions
The trunk whose member subcards are equipped with eTM boards of different types does not support the downstream HQoS function.The trunk whose member subcards are both eTM and non-eTM subcards does not support the downstream HQoS function.

The PAF file SPEC_FUNC_QOS_SUPPORT_BRAS_SQ applies only to the following boards equipped with non-eTM subcards: LPUF-240/LPUF-240-B/LPUF-240-E/LPUF-200-E/LPUI-240/LPUI-240-B/LPUI-240-L.
This command takes effect only on the following boards: CR57LPUF120A, CR57LPUF240A.
